summary: Dark blue scheme with parallax effect
name: 3DGlasses.vim
description:
This was supposed to be a Tron color scheme, but I don't think it quite captured the essence of the Tron universe.
This scheme uses a dark blue background against which soft blue text is set.  Bright red highlights really stand out (that's due to the chromostereoscopic effect).

Send feedback to g?? ArjBsnyFbCe@tzNnvZy.pbz - ABFCNZ
install_details:
Put 3dglasses.vim inside your colors directory.
:colo 3dglasses
Also check out vimscript #2004 for a handy way to organize your color schemes.

versions.release_notes:
Changed MatchParens group so that matching <> in xml files show up better. 
Be sure to append <:> to your matchpairs option.
